description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Join the red robot on his epic quest for revenge! Red Robot Revenge is a platformer in which you play as a tiny robot trying to avenge his fallen robot girlfriend. Try to reach the end of each level while avoiding spikes, blades and tons of other obstacles. Play through 90 challenging levels and 3 unique worlds!
